synopsis.text: Hoping to make a name for himself in the world of college rugby, Natsusa Yuzuki enrolls in a prestigious university, only to have his dreams dashed by an unexpected motorcycle accident. With a spinal hernia leaving him unable to play, Natsusa takes on the role of team manager, determined to lead his team to victory in the Kansai university rugby league. Joined by his stoic childhood friend Seiichirou, the hot-headed Yasunari Tsuru, the admiring Yuu Mashiro, and the enigmatic senior Ibuki Ueoka, Natsusa must navigate the challenges of college life and the pressures of competitive rugby, all while coming to terms with his own limitations and finding a new way to contribute to the sport he loves. Can this unlikely group of teammates overcome their differences and rise to the top of the league, or will their personal struggles and rivalries prove too much to handle? Join Natsusa and his fellow players as they take on the world of college rugby and discover what it truly means to be a team.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
